pullrequest.title: Fix up pkg-config and cmake files when falling back to ignition-math3.

content.raw:
The default branch build of ignition-common failed too:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/74/

So I don't think it's unique to this branch, but I have no idea why it happened. I ssh'd to the machine and tried to reproduce the failure, but it looks like it's working. I've re-queued both jobs.

Sometimes permissions can get messed up if someone installs something on that machine from the osrf account, but I don't know if anyone did that yesterday.

I did merge a release-tools pull request, but I don't see how it could be related:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/459/brew-use-versioned-project_formula-more-to/diff
content.html:
The default branch build of ignition-common failed too:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/74/

So I don't think it's unique to this branch, but I have no idea why it happened. I ssh'd to the machine and tried to reproduce the failure, but it looks like it's working. I've re-queued both jobs.

Sometimes permissions can get messed up if someone installs something on that machine from the osrf account, but I don't know if anyone did that yesterday.

I did merge a release-tools pull request, but I don't see how it could be related:

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/459/brew-use-versioned-project_formula-more-to/diff
